author: Dewayne Bevil
title: Don't miss: Brick or Treat at Legoland Florida
text:
Don't miss: Brick or Treat at Legoland Florida Brick or Treat returns to Legoland Florida 
Legoland celebrates Halloween in October. 
Legoland celebrates Halloween in October. Dewayne Bevil Contact Reporter Orlando Sentinel Legoland celebrates Halloween with Brick or Treat festivities 
WHAT: Legoland Florida is spreading family-friendly Halloween cheer across the theme park. Festivities on event days include costume contests, a scavenger hunt in Miniland USA, meet-and-greets with Lego characters plus a new 13-foot Lego hearse. The evenings are capped with pirates-themed fireworks. 
WHEN: 10 a.m.-8 p.m., Saturday, Sunday, Oct. 17, 18, 23, 24, 25, 30 and 31. 
WHERE: 1 Legoland Way, Winter Haven 
COST: Included in regular park admission. A one-day ticket to Legoland Florida is $89 ($82 for ages 3-12). 
CALL: 877-350-5346
